content:
Craft an item of type: coarse_dirt
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 15, "index": 32}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 36}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft coarse_dirt, I need to place dirt and gravel side by side in the crafting grid. There is a dirt block in slot 20, so I will move it into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have placed the dirt, I need to place the gravel next to it. There is a gravel block in slot 35, so I will move it to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1
